scripts.docker:stop: docker stop $(docker ps | grep rss-proxy-dev | awk '{print $1}') &>/dev/null
scripts.build:dev: cd docker/dev && docker build -t rss-proxy-dev -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build:playground: cd ../playground && npm run build -- --prod && npm pack
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:proxy && rm -rf docker/prod/.build-cache && mkdir -p docker/prod/.build-cache && cp package.json docker/prod/.build-cache && cp -rf build/proxy/* docker/prod/.build-cache && cd docker/prod && docker build -t rss-proxy-prod -f Dockerfile .
scripts.run:prod: npm run build:prod && docker run -p 80:3000 -t rssproxy-prod
